name: Font of Magic
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Warnis had always felt a glimmer of potential within herself, flickering just out of reach. That night, as the cultists attacked, it became a torrent of power that was hers to command.

name: Icewind Stalwart
oracle_text: Protection Fighting Style — When Icewind Stalwart enters the battlefield, exile up to one target non-Warrior creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Font of Magic
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.

name: Greatsword of Tyr
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and tap up to one target creature defending player controls.
Equip {W} ({W}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: In the light of its gleaming blade, the faithful shine and the wicked cower.

name: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The essence of red dragon burns within, always ready to rise with wrath.

name: Jade Orb of Dragonkind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and gains hexproof until your next turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Lapis Orb of Dragonkind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Elturel Survivors
oracle_text:
Trample, myriad
As long as Elturel Survivors is attacking, it gets +X/+0, where X is the number of lands defending player controls.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: They fought with the desperate courage of those who have nothing left to loose.

name: Nine-Fingers Keene
oracle_text:
Menace
Ward—Pay 9 life.
Whenever Nine-Fingers Keene deals combat damage to a player, look at the top nine cards of your library. You may put a Gate card from among them onto the battlefield. Then if you control nine or more Gates, put the rest into your hand. Otherwise put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Drillworks Mole
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Drillworks Mole and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target commander creature you control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The Flaming Fist soldiers prepared to face a bulette, or worse, but the cause of the rumblings turned out to be much more benign and bizarre.

name: Mirror of Life Trapping
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if it was cast, exile it, then return all other permanent cards exiled with Mirror of Life Trapping to the battlefield under their owners' control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: The Council of Four
oracle_text:
Whenever a player draws their second card during their turn, you draw a card.
Whenever a player casts their second spell during their turn, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Ambition has a price in Baldur's Gate, and it is paid to the Council.

name: Minthara, Merciless Soul
oracle_text:
Ward {X}, where X is the number of experience counters you have.
At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you get an experience counter.
Creatures you control get +1/+0 for each experience counter you have.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Kagha, Shadow Archdruid
oracle_text:
Whenever Kagha, Shadow Archdruid attack, it gains deathtouch until end of turn. Mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a permanent spell from among cards in your graveyard that were put there from your library this turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Street Urchin
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "{1}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Your harsh upbringing on the streets of the city left you crafty, resilient, and wise beyond your years.

name: "Owlbear Cub"
oracle_text: Mama's Coming — Whenever "Owlbear Cub" attacks a player who controls eight or more lands, look at the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that player. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in random order.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Descent into Avernus
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put two descent counter on Descent into Avernus. Then each player creates X Treasure tokens and Descent into Avernus deals X damage to them, where X is the number of descent counters on Descent into Avernus.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Popular Entertainer
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls." (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The last thing anyone would describe you as is shy. You love the spotlight, and it loves you back.

oracle_text:

name: Gale's Redirection
oracle_text:
Exile target spell, then roll a d20 and add that spell's mana value.
1-14 | You may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
15+ | You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Ascend from Avernus
oracle_text: Return all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile Ascend from Avernus.

name: Veteran Soldier
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks a player, if no opponent has more life than that that player, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking that player."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You've always been happiest fighting for a cause you believe in alongside loyal comrades.

name: Pact Weapon
oracle_text:
As long as Pact Weapon is attached to a creature, you don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, draw a card and reveal it. The creature gets +X/+X until end of turn and you lose X life, where X is that card's mana value.
Equip—Discard a card.

name: Iron Mastiff
oracle_text:
Whenever Iron Mastiff attacks, roll a d20 for each player being attacked and ignore all but the highest roll.
1-9 | Iron Mastiff deals damage equal to its power to you.
10-19 | Iron Mastiff deals damage equal to its power to defending player.
20 | Iron Mastiff deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Ravenloft Adventurer
oracle_text:
When Ravenloft Adventurer, you take the initiative.
If a creature an opponent controls would die, instead exile it and put a hit counter on it.
Whenever Ravenloft Adventurer attacks, if you've completed a dungeon, defending player loses 1 life for each card they own in exile with a hit counter on it.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Tomb of Horrors Adventurer
oracle_text:
When Tomb of Horrors Adventurer enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, copy it. If you've completed a dungeon, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
